接口 CrudService

所有已知子接口：
BeanService
所有已知实现类：
AbstractBeanService
public interface CrudService

作者：
G.Lee

方法摘要
 void batchMerge(java.util.List objectsToMerge)
          merge(Batch) the state of the given entitys into the current persistence context.
 void batchPersist(java.util.List objectsToSave)
          make an objectsToSave(batch) instance managed and persistent.
 void batchRemove(java.util.List objectsToRemove)
          remove(Batch) the entitys instance.
 Idable findById(java.lang.Class<?> entityClass, java.io.Serializable entityId)
          find entity by id.
 java.util.List<?> getAll(java.lang.Class<?> entityClass)
          get all data with entity .
 java.util.List<?> getAllDistinct(java.lang.Class<?> entityClass)
          get all distinct data with entity.
 Idable merge(Idable entity)
          merge(save or update) entity to database.
 void remove(Idable entity)
          remove entity to database.
 Idable save(Idable entity)
          save entity to database.
